trans-unit.source: htmlArea RTE > Edit Element
trans-unit.target: htmlArea RTE > Edit Element

trans-unit.source: The "Edit element" dialogue allows to edit the general attributes of an element in the RTE editing area.
trans-unit.target: The "Edit element" dialogue allows to edit the general attributes of an element in the RTE editing area.

trans-unit.source: Clicking the "Edit element" icon in the RTE tool bar opens a dialogue that allows to edit the general attributes of an element. The dialogue allows to edit the id, title, class, lang and dir attributes of the element. It also allows to specify handlers for keyboard and mouse events.
trans-unit.target: Clicking the "Edit element" icon in the RTE tool bar opens a dialogue that allows to edit the general attributes of an element. The dialogue allows to edit the id, title, class, lang and dir attributes of the element. It also allows to specify handlers for keyboard and mouse events.

trans-unit.source: EXT:rtehtmlarea/extensions/EditElement/skin/images/element-edit.png
trans-unit.target: EXT:rtehtmlarea/extensions/EditElement/skin/images/element-edit.png
trans-unit.note: This string contains an internal text, which must not be changed. Just copy the original text into the translation field. For more information have a look at the Tutorial.

trans-unit.source: "Edit element" icon in the editor tool bar.
trans-unit.target: "Edit element" icon in the editor tool bar.

trans-unit.source: xEXT_rtehtmlarea_EditElement:id, xEXT_rtehtmlarea_EditElement:title, xEXT_rtehtmlarea_EditElement:className, xEXT_rtehtmlarea_Language:languageCombo, xEXT_rtehtmlarea_Language:directionCombo, xEXT_rtehtmlarea_EditElement:events
trans-unit.target: xEXT_rtehtmlarea_EditElement:id, xEXT_rtehtmlarea_EditElement:title, xEXT_rtehtmlarea_EditElement:className, xEXT_rtehtmlarea_Language:languageCombo, xEXT_rtehtmlarea_Language:directionCombo, xEXT_rtehtmlarea_EditElement:events
trans-unit.note: This string contains an internal text, which must not be changed. Just copy the original text into the translation field. For more information have a look at the Tutorial.

trans-unit.source: Id attribute
trans-unit.target: Id attribute

trans-unit.source: Enter or edit the value of the id attribute of the element.
trans-unit.target: Enter or edit the value of the id attribute of the element.

trans-unit.source: Title attribute
trans-unit.target: Title attribute

trans-unit.source: Enter or edit the value of the title attribute of the element.
trans-unit.target: Enter or edit the value of the title attribute of the element.

trans-unit.source: Class attribute
trans-unit.target: Class attribute

trans-unit.source: Choose a CSS class selector to be assigned to the element.
trans-unit.target: Choose a CSS class selector to be assigned to the element.

trans-unit.source: Event handlers
trans-unit.target: Event handlers

trans-unit.source: Using this fieldset, edit handlers for keyboard and mouse events.
trans-unit.target: Using this fieldset, edit handlers for keyboard and mouse events.

trans-unit.source: Onkeydown event handler
trans-unit.target: Onkeydown event handler

trans-unit.source: Enter or edit the script to be run when a key is pressed.
trans-unit.target: Enter or edit the script to be run when a key is pressed.

trans-unit.source: Onkeypress event handler
trans-unit.target: Onkeypress event handler

trans-unit.source: Enter or edit the script to be run when a key is pressed and released.
trans-unit.target: Enter or edit the script to be run when a key is pressed and released.

trans-unit.source: Onkeyup event handler
trans-unit.target: Onkeyup event handler

trans-unit.source: Enter or edit the script to be run when a key is pressed and released.
trans-unit.target: Enter or edit the script to be run when a key is pressed and released.

trans-unit.source: Onclick event handler
trans-unit.target: Onclick event handler

trans-unit.source: Enter or edit the script to be run on a mouse click.
trans-unit.target: Enter or edit the script to be run on a mouse click.

trans-unit.source: Ondblclick event handler
trans-unit.target: Ondblclick event handler

trans-unit.source: Enter or edit the script to be run on a mouse double-click.
trans-unit.target: Enter or edit the script to be run on a mouse double-click.

trans-unit.source: Onmousedown event handler
trans-unit.target: Onmousedown event handler

trans-unit.source: Enter or edit the script to be run when a mouse button is pressed.
trans-unit.target: Enter or edit the script to be run when a mouse button is pressed.

trans-unit.source: Onmousemove event handler
trans-unit.target: Onmousemove event handler

trans-unit.source: Enter or edit the script to be run when the mouse pointer moves.
trans-unit.target: Enter or edit the script to be run when the mouse pointer moves.

trans-unit.source: Onmouseout event handler
trans-unit.target: Onmouseout event handler

trans-unit.source: Enter or edit the script to be run when mouse pointer moves out of the element.
trans-unit.target: Enter or edit the script to be run when mouse pointer moves out of the element.

trans-unit.source: Onmouseover event handler
trans-unit.target: Onmouseover event handler

trans-unit.source: Enter or edit the script to be run when mouse pointer moves over the element.
trans-unit.target: Enter or edit the script to be run when mouse pointer moves over the element.

trans-unit.source: Onmouseup event handler
trans-unit.target: Onmouseup event handler

trans-unit.source: Enter or edit the script to be run when a mouse button is released.
trans-unit.target: Enter or edit the script to be run when a mouse button is released.
